chapters.title: Chapter 25:  Return to Bandar Eban
chapters.info: Iralin, p. 407—Dockmaster in Bandar Eban. He is clean shaven, which is uncommon for Domani men, and tall. He reported that all food in the Sea Folk ships has spoiled. As it turned out, he had merely opened every bag of food that spoiled, and none of the bags that had not.
